column1: Kata Robata////Though when I went here with my boyfriend one random day
column2: we were dressed so casual. Like I just came from the gym casual and we felt so underdressed lol next time I know to dress up a little bit when I come here! Also the food is great here! Sadly
column3: we didn't try any of the fancy dishes here
column4: we just came here for the sushi and the ramen.
